dialogue.content: I've been constipated on and off and it's annoying.
Has anything changed recently-diet, stress, activity, or travel?
Diet and stress, probably. I've been eating more takeout.
Got it. Do you want gentle changes or a strict plan?
Gentle. I won't stick to strict.
Okay. How's your water intake lately?
Not great. I forget until I'm really thirsty.
Understood. We can start with small, consistent habits.
If I could get regular again without doing something extreme, that would be great.
